story.title: Our Story
story.content: Nomad Barbershop was founded in 2021 with a clear vision - to create a space where a haircut becomes an experience. A place where quality grooming meets relaxation with whiskey and craft beer.
story.content2: It all started in 2021 when we opened our first location with a clear vision - to create a space where men can escape everyday life, relax, and leave in style.
story.content3: Today we have 4 locations in Zagreb, a team of 5 experienced barbers, and thousands of satisfied clients who keep coming back because they know what to expect - excellence.

philosophy.title: Our Philosophy
philosophy.content: We believe every man deserves time for himself. Our barbershop is more than a place for a haircut - it's an oasis where you can escape from everyday life.
philosophy.content2: We believe every man deserves time for himself. Our barbershop is more than just a place for a haircut - it's an oasis where you can escape stress, relax with a good whiskey or beer, and leave with renewed energy.
philosophy.content3: The name "Nomad" symbolizes the spirit of adventure and discovery - every visit is an opportunity to try something new, whether it's a new hairstyle, a new whiskey, or a new story.

reservation.title: Do I need to book in advance?
reservation.content: Yes, we recommend booking through our online platform Fresha. Walk-in appointments are possible depending on availability, but booking ensures your spot.

drinks.title: Is the drink included in the price?
drinks.content: Yes! Every client is entitled to a complimentary whiskey or craft beer during their service. It's part of the Nomad experience that makes us special.

parking.title: Is there parking near the locations?
parking.content: All our locations have parking available nearby. For the Zagreb Tower location, parking is in the building garage. For other locations, there's free parking in the area.

giftcards.title: Can I buy a gift card?
giftcards.content: Of course! Gift cards are available in any amount and you can buy them online or at any of our locations. A perfect gift for a friend or family member.

cancel.title: What is the cancellation policy?
cancel.content: Please cancel or reschedule your appointment at least 24 hours in advance. This allows other clients to book your spot.

products.title: What products do you use?
products.content: We use premium products from brands like Reuzel and Meštar Spartium. All products are available for purchase for home use at any of our locations.

kids.title: Do you provide services for children?
kids.content: Yes, we cut children's hair too. We recommend an earlier appointment when the atmosphere is calmer. Children under 18 cannot consume alcohol but can enjoy non-alcoholic beverages.

first-visit.title: What can I expect on my first visit?
first-visit.content: On your first visit, you'll consult with your barber about your desired style, get recommendations, and enjoy the complete Nomad experience - from the haircut to the whiskey. Plan for about 45 minutes to an hour.
